summary: Mad at having no bed or chairs after a long, cold and dusty day in a rough island? This mod adds a player bed and chest to Tel Mithryn, a bed, chest, more chairs and benches and alchemy/enchanting equipment in the Skaal Great Hall, and chairs and benches in the Thirsk Mead Hall (activate only after defeating the Rieklings on the side of the Thirsk
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][center]Nexus Exclusive -- Requires Skyrim Update 1.8.151.0+ and Dragonborn DLC -- Certified Cleaned[/center][/color][/b]
[b][center][color=#00ff00]THIS NOT-FOR PROFIT MOD CAN BE DOWNLOADED AND USED FREE OF CHARGE[/color][/center][/b]
-----------------------
[b][color=yellow]Introduction[/color][/b]
Mad at having no bed or chairs after a long, cold and dusty day in a rough island? Read on.

In the course of playing Dragonborn, it's frustrating to the extreme that after a long day of fighting and exploring I couldn't get a warm place to crash and sleep in the Skaal village or in Tel Mithryn, or nothing to sit on at the Thirsk Mead Hall after beating the Rieklings and watching the warriors idle around at the entrance.

So to make things easy while at Solstheim and with the Creation Kit, all I did was to add beds, chests and some furniture to all three places. What it does is very simple, doesn't change anything too much, and gives your character a good and convenient chance to sleep, or sit down.

[b][color=yellow]Changes[/color][/b]
[b]In Tel Mithryn:[/b] added a bed, chest and a couple of chairs. So much for Neloth's promise of a bed and chest. (NOTE: this has since been superseded by a UDBP update (I think) that installs a player bed and chest.)

[b]In the Skaal Great Hall:[/b] added a bed, chest, some chairs and benches for better authenticity as a true Great Hall, plus an enchanting and alchemy table and a couple of lights. Interior music changed to that of a tavern. (CAVEAT: I discovered that you're not allowed to sleep in the Great Hall as they're "asking you to leave"; I may have to start making a custom player home as a more proper replacement. Instead, please download the new [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32136/]Bayview Player Home[/url][/b].)

[b]In the Thirsk Mead Hall:[/b] added chairs and benches. [i]Best used after wiping out the Rieklings and retaking the whole hootch by taking the side of the evicted Thirsk resident-warriors.[/i] Interior music changed to that of a tavern.

[b][color=yellow]Installation[/color][/b]
Installation: you can pick any of the three mods to download with NMM.
Uninstallation: using NMM, select the mod and uninstall.

[b][color=yellow]Notices[/color][/b]
Any alterations will require my permission. Uploading to sites other than Nexus is prohibited.
author: sa547

files.name: Player Lodging for Skaal Great Hall
files.fileName: Player Lodging for Skaal Great Hall-31518-1-0rc.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Thirsk Mead Hall: added benches and chairs, and altered interior music.
Tel Mithryn: added bed, chest and chair.
Skraal Great Hall: added bed, chest, several chairs and benches, plus alchemy and enchanting tables, and changed interior music.
